competition_summary.context: Competition in the Established Pharmaceutical Products segment is generally from other health care and pharmaceutical companies. In addition, the substitution of generic drugs for the brand prescribed and introduction of additional forms of already marketed established products by generic or branded competitors may increase competitive pressures. ________________________________________________________ * As used throughout the text of this report on Form 10-K, the term “Abbott” refers to Abbott

Competition in the Established Pharmaceutical Products segment is generally from other health care and pharmaceutical companies. In addition, the substitution of generic drugs for the brand prescribed and introduction of additional forms of already marketed established products by generic or branded competitors may increase competitive pressures. ________________________________________________________ * As used throughout the text of this report on Form 10-K, the term “Abbott” refers to Abbott
